> Utility to create standard assets that can be rendered in [DID Wallet](https://www.abtwallet.io)


## Table of Contents

* [Install](#install)
* [Usage](#usage)


## Install

```sh
npm install @ocap/asset
// or
yarn add @ocap/asset
```
